content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

Introducing our brand new ranges of Sofa Beds. We believe that these are a truly brilliant addition and are as popular now as ever before. With their modern designs and their bold styles, these will really stand out in any room.

These are perfect for commercial hospitality such as hotels, holiday parks and homes and even places within the healthcare sector, such as hospitals.

The Amur shows off a very bold and simple design, perfect for a quiet and relaxing environment. As we as being a 3 seater sofa, it features a double sofa bed, giving you plenty of room to enjoy a comfy night in.

This is also comes with a 2 year warranty but should last for years to come.
